General.Name: Pesorama Inc.
General.Description: PesoRama Inc. operates a chain of retail stores in Mexico. Its stores offer household goods, pet supplies, seasonal products, party supplies, health and beauty, snack food items, confectionery, and other products. The company operates its stores under the JOi Dollar Plus brand name. PesoRama Inc. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 217 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 0R2
